creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: dog on ground, head turned toward its rear quarters, front legs splayed; legs of man at L, and legs of horse at R
marks:
Signature

in graphite on recto at lower left co signed in graphite below platemark, at right: [Duc
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until May 18, 1989; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Dog Sleeping on Pavers at a Man's Feet
